items.title: General Dentistry

items.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
items.description: Advanced treatments to enhance your smile

testimonials.name: Shriya
testimonials.comment: I had gone to Dr. Monika Ashar for a root canal treatment. She is very gentle and calm in her approach, has a very patient and approachable attitude, at the same time very technically sound and explained the procedure well. She is one of the few doctors who checks up on you after the treatment is done, Highly recommend her for any dental treatment.

testimonials.name: Daisy
testimonials.comment: Dr. Monika is a well experienced dentist. Treatment was very good. She makes the patient feel very comfortable.

testimonials.name: Harrison
testimonials.comment: Dr. Monika is excellent in her work. Also very supportive in terms of booking schedules and has a lot of patience towards her patients! Always recommended for the best results :))

testimonials.name: Sarah
testimonials.comment: I had a fantastic experience with Dr. Monika. Dr. Monika's expertise and gentle approach made me feel at ease throughout my treatment. I highly recommend her for top-notch dental care!

about.title: Meet Our Doctor
about.description: She is committed to providing you with the highest quality care in a comfortable environment.

clinicOverview.title: Modern Facilities
clinicOverview.description: Experience dental care in our state-of-the-art facility equipped with the latest technology for your comfort and the best possible treatment outcomes.

values.title: Patient-Centric Care
values.description: Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities.

values.title: Latest Technology
values.description: We utilize advanced dental technology for precise and comfortable treatments.

values.title: Gentle Approach
values.description: Our gentle and caring approach ensures a stress-free dental experience.

team.name: Dr. Monika Ashar
team.bio: Dr. Monika has over 15 years of experience in cosmetic dentistry and is committed to providing the highest quality dental care.

bookAppointment.title: Book Your Appointment
bookAppointment.description: Schedule your visit with our dental experts. We'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
